item.title: 加纳两年来首家锂矿公司上市
item.description: 总部位于澳大利亚的大西洋锂业有限公司（Atlantic Lithium Ltd.）正在开发加纳的第一个锂矿，该公司已向该国的股权投资者筹集资金迈出了一步。【原文：Australian-based Atlantic Lithium Ltd., which is developing Ghana’s first lithium mine, has taken a step toward raising capital from equity investors in the country.】

item.title: 美国银行莫伊尼汉称，即使利率高企，消费者依然强劲
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.首席执行官布莱恩-莫伊尼汉（Brian Moynihan）表示，美国消费者在工资增长的帮助下，即使在利率高企的情况下也保持着良好的状态，企业也再次开始关注并购。【原文：Bank of America Corp. Chief Executive Officer Brian Moynihan said US consumers, helped by wage growth, remain in good shape even amid elevated interest rates, and that businesses are once again looking at mergers and acquisitions.】

item.title: 分析发现：创纪录的移民潮推动英国住房租金上涨
item.description: 新的分析显示，由于住房供给跟不上人口增长的速度，创纪录的净移民人数推动了英国的租房危机。【原文：Britain’s rental crisis is being driven by record net migration as housing supply fails to keep pace with a growing population, according to new analysis.】

item.title: 德雅丹称加拿大应增加期限更长的抵押贷款
item.description: 加拿大最大的金融合作社表示，加拿大应采取措施推出更多续期更长的抵押贷款。【原文：Canada should take steps to introduce more mortgages with longer renewal terms, according to the country’s largest financial co-operative.】

item.title: 意大利称乌克兰财政部长将参加斯特雷萨七国集团会议
item.description: 据东道国意大利称，乌克兰财政部长谢尔盖-马尔琴科（Serhiy Marchenko）将参加下周在斯特雷萨举行的七国集团财政部长和央行行长会谈。【原文：Ukrainian Finance Minister Serhiy Marchenko will be part of the talks among Group of Seven finance chiefs and central bankers congregating in Stresa next week, according to host-nation Italy.】

item.title: 据说大众汽车在股价大涨后有意出售特拉通股票
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，大众汽车公司正在探索出售多达 10 亿欧元（11 亿美元）的 Traton SE 股票，利用这家卡车制造商股价飙升的机会增加可供交易的股票数量。【原文：Volkswagen AG is exploring the sale of as much as €1 billion ($1.1 billion) of stock in Traton SE, people familiar with the matter said, taking advantage of the truckmaker’s surging price to increase the number of shares available for trading.】

item.title: 卡尔维诺表示，欧洲投资银行准备加强对国防工业的支持
item.description: 欧洲投资银行行长纳迪娅-卡尔维诺（Nadia Calvino）表示，欧洲投资银行将通过资助更广泛的军民两用项目，帮助该地区发展国防工业。【原文：The European Investment Bank will help the region develop its defense industry by financing a wider array of dual-use projects, President Nadia Calvino said.】

item.title: 交易员在 "咆哮的凯蒂猫 "炒作之前买入 GameStop 期权
item.description: 交易员们在 GameStop 公司期权上悄悄建仓，导致了这只 "僵尸股 "周一的疯狂上涨。【原文：Traders quietly gathered positions in GameStop Corp. options leading up to Monday’s wild rally in the meme stock.】

item.title: GameStop 短裤在备忘录复兴中蒙受 14 亿美元的纸张损失
item.description: 在视频游戏零售商 GameStop Corp. 的股价本月上涨了约三倍之后，那些对该公司持怀疑态度的人面临着超过 10 亿美元的损失。【原文：Skeptics betting against video-game retailer GameStop Corp. are facing a more than $1 billion loss after the company’s share price roughly tripled this month.】

item.title: 美国发布加强对冲基金洗钱防御的计划
item.description: 美国财政部和证券交易委员会提出了旨在防止投资基金被用于洗钱或资助恐怖活动的新规则。【原文：The US Treasury Department and the Securities and Exchange Commission proposed new rules that aim to keep investment funds from being used to launder money or fund terrorist activity.】

item.title: 纳斯达克在精简机构的努力中考虑出售 Solovis 公司
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，纳斯达克公司正在考虑出售投资组合管理软件和服务提供商 Solovis，因为该交易所运营商在完成有史以来规模最大的收购后正在寻求瘦身。【原文：Nasdaq Inc. is considering a sale of Solovis, a provider of portfolio-management software and services, as the exchange operator seeks to slim down following its largest-ever acquisition, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 高盛集团所罗门认为法国正在迈出更多有利于商业的步伐
item.description: 大卫-所罗门（David Solomon）说，法国领导人努力使这个国家对企业更加友好，这让他很受鼓舞，因为高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：David Solomon said he’s encouraged by French leaders’ efforts to make the country more friendly to business as Goldman Sachs Group Inc. has tripled its Paris headcount in recent years.】

item.title: 戴蒙会见德克萨斯州检察长，因为该州禁止银行执行 ESG 政策
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）会见了得克萨斯州总检察长肯-帕克斯顿（Ken Paxton），这位共和党官员威胁要禁止更多银行帮助该州及其地方政府出售债券，为项目筹集资金。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon met with Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton as the Republican official threatens to bar more banks from helping the state and its local governments sell bonds to raise funds for projects.】

item.title: 高盛警告新兴市场面临 "邪恶 "美元风险
item.description: 高盛集团的卡马克希亚-特里维迪（Kamakshya Trivedi）说，美元的强势有可能使新兴市场变得 "险恶"，促使更脆弱国家的当局重新考虑降息，以捍卫本国货币。【原文：The strength of the US dollar is threatening to turn “sinister” for emerging markets, prompting authorities in more vulnerable nations to rethink interest rates cuts in order to defend their currencies, said Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s Kamakshya Trivedi.】

item.title: 盎格鲁再次拒绝必和必拓，自身战略面临压力
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）拒绝了必和必拓集团（BHP Group）对该矿商估值 430 亿美元的第二次求购。【原文：Anglo American Plc rejected a second approach from BHP Group that valued the miner at $43 billion, as pressure builds on the 107-year old company to lay out a compelling vision to survive on its own.】

item.title: 约翰-米勒的新垃圾债券基金在五个月内达到 10 亿美元的规模
item.description: 约翰-米勒（John Miller）新成立的高收益市政债券基金在短短不到五个月的时间里就积累了 10 亿美元的资产，吸引了众多渴望投资于国家和地方政府债务中风险最大部分的买家。【原文：John Miller’s new high-yield municipal-bond fund has amassed $1 billion of assets in just under five months, drawing buyers eager to invest in the riskiest segment of state and local-government debt.】

item.title: 国债在四月通胀数据倒计时期间走高
item.description: 美国国债走高，抹去了上周五约一半的跌幅，因为交易员们期待着可能改变美联储货币政策前景的重要通胀报告。【原文：US Treasuries advanced, erasing about half of Friday’s declines, as traders looked ahead to critical inflation reports with the potential to alter the outlook for Federal Reserve monetary policy.】

item.description:

item.title: 高盛称经济前景恶化 对冲基金抛售金融股
item.description: 对冲基金加大了对金融股的抛售力度，因为美国经济增长出现疲软迹象，而且该行业接近关键技术位。【原文：Hedge funds ramped up their selling of financial stocks as US economic growth shows signs of weakness and the sector approaches a key technical level.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行任命斯托普尼克领导改组后的全球投资银行部
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行的投资银行业务采用了全球架构，并任命马修-斯托普尼克（Matthew Stopnik）为该部门主管。【原文：Royal Bank of Canada has adopted a global structure for its investment-banking business and tapped Matthew Stopnik to head up the division.】

item.title: 荷兰联合政党同意取消 15%的股票回购税
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，正在谈判组建下一届荷兰政府的四个政党已同意取消对股票回购征收 15%的税。【原文：The four parties in talks to form the next Dutch government have agreed to cancel a 15% tax on share buybacks, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Stifel 预测 S&P 500 指数最快将在本季度下跌 10
item.description: Stifel Nicolaus & Co.的巴里-班尼斯特（Barry Bannister）认为，通胀问题停滞不前，将使美联储的降息时间晚于交易商目前的预期，这很可能会引发美国股市在未来几个月内大幅下跌。【原文：Stalled-out progress on inflation, which will push Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts to later than traders currently expect, is probably going to trigger a big decline in US equities in the coming months, according to Stifel Nicolaus & Co.’s Barry Bannister.】

item.title: 巴西前央行行长坎祖克表示，巴西央行将采取行动安抚投资者
item.description: 据巴西央行的一位前董事称，巴西央行上一次政策会议的纪要将设法安抚因董事会在利率问题上的分歧投票而感到不安的投资者。【原文：Brazil central bank’s minutes to its last policy meeting will seek to calm investors who were rattled by the board’s split vote on interest rates, according to a former director at the institution.】

item.title: 沃尔格林为价值 70 亿英镑的博姿连锁药店联系潜在买家
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沃尔格林博姿联盟公司（Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc.【原文：Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc. is reaching out to potential buyers of the £7 billion ($8.8 billion) Boots drugstore chain in the UK, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 通胀风险加剧，波兰降息前景被推后
item.description: 随着央行对通胀的担忧成倍增加，波兰今年降息的前景越来越渺茫。【原文：Prospects for Polish interest rate reductions this year are dwindling as central banker concerns about inflation multiply.】

item.title: 肯尼亚 15%的基础设施债券税可能会阻碍外国投资
item.description: 肯尼亚政府计划开始对基础设施债券的利息征税，税率高达 15%，此举可能会损害这种流行证券的外汇流入。【原文：The Kenyan government plans to start taxing interest from infrastructure bonds by as much as 15%, a move that could hurt foreign currency inflows for the popular securities.】

item.title: 津巴布韦将恢复移动支付服务，货币崩溃曾是其罪魁祸首
item.description: 津巴布韦将允许曾被指责为助长其现已失效的津巴布韦元崩溃的移动货币代理商重新运营，以促进其新的黄金支持货币的使用。【原文：Zimbabwe will allow mobile money agents, once blamed for fueling the collapse of its now defunct Zimbabwean dollar, to operate again to boost the use of its new gold-backed currency.】

item.title: 据说 TDR 接近收购意大利零售商 Acqua & Sapone
item.description: 知情人士透露，TDR Capital 正在与美国投资公司 H.I.G. Capital 就收购意大利折扣零售商 Acqua & Sapone 进行独家磋商。【原文：TDR Capital is in exclusive discussions to buy Italian discount retailer Acqua & Sapone from US investment firm H.I.G. Capital, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 瑞银集团埃尔莫蒂称自己可能留任首席执行官至 2027 年初
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）首席执行官塞尔吉奥-埃尔莫蒂（Sergio Ermotti）打算继续执掌这家瑞士银行，直到完成吸收合并瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）的任务，这意味着他可能会在位到 2027 年初。【原文：UBS Group AG Chief Executive Officer Sergio Ermotti intends to stay at the helm of the Swiss bank until the task of absorbing Credit Suisse is complete, meaning he could be in place until early 2027.】
